text: Hey, did you know the very first professional baseball team was from an Ohio city? I just learned that, like, yesterday.
No way. That's actually pretty cool. I mean, I figured it was somewhere in the Northeast, but Ohio?
Right? It's not what you'd expect, is it. Just a little piece of sports history.
I'll have to look up which city it was. That's a fun fact to, uh, pull out at a party.
